Question_1: How would you rate the clarity, focus, and overall control of the essay's ideas?
Question_2: How well do the main ideas of the essay stand out and are they effectively developed?
Question_3: How relevant, detailed, and well-chosen are the supporting details used in the essay?
Question_4: How thoroughly and in-depth is the exploration of the essay's topic? Does the writing make connections and share insights?
Question_5: How well-suited are the content and selected details to the intended audience and purpose of the essay?
